plugin.name: TrainAssist
plugin.author: Stormwind
plugin.purpose: To provide a better character training experience

trigger.match: ^You have (\d+) total stats out of (\d+) maximum.$

muclient.script:
function OnHelp () world.Note (world.GetPluginInfo (world.GetPluginID (), 3)) end
function display_info() ColourNote("SteelBlue", "", "[", "MediumSeaGreen", "", "--------------------------------------------------------------------------------", "SteelBlue", "", "]") ColourNote("SteelBlue", "", "[", "MediumSeaGreen", "", "Strength", "SteelBlue", "", "] can be trained " .. str_canTrain .. " times" ) end
function setup_train_session_var(name, line, wildcards) char_train_sessions = wildcards[1] end
function setup_stat_vars(name, line, wildcards) statName = wildcards[1]
if statName == "Strength" then str_yourCost = wildcards[6] str_trainedAmt = wildcards[7] str_statMax = wildcards[8] str_canTrain = str_statMax - str_trainedAmt elseif statName == "Intelligence" then int_yourCost = wildcards[6] int_trainedAmt = wildcards[7] int_statMax = wildcards[8] int_canTrain = int_statMax - int_trainedAmt elseif statName == "Wisdom" then wis_yourCost = wildcards[6] wis_trainedAmt = wildcards[7] wis_statMax = wildcards[8] wis_canTrain = wis_statMax - wis_trainedAmt elseif statName == "Dexteriry" then dex_yourCost = wildcards[6] dex_trainedAmt = wildcards[7] dex_statMax = wildcards[8] dex_canTrain = dex_statMax - dex_trainedAmt elseif statName == "Constitution" then con_yourCost = wildcards[6] con_trainedAmt = wildcards[7] con_statMax = wildcards[8] con_canTrain = con_statMax - con_trainedAmt elseif statName == "Luck" then lck_yourCost = wildcards[6] lck_trainedAmt = wildcards[7] lck_statMax = wildcards[8] lck_canTrain = lck_statMax - lck_trainedAmt else
end
end
function showmsg(stat, amountCanTrain) ColourNote("SteelBlue", "", "[", "MediumSeaGreen", "", stat, "SteelBlue", "", "] can be trained " .. amountCanTrain .. " times" ) end
